subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: For the Fiesta Bowl, Fox assembled an announcing team of Thom Brennaman, better known for calling Fox baseball; Barry Alvarez, the former Wisconsin coach; and Charles Davis, who is on loan from TBS.
snippet: For the Fiesta Bowl, Fox assembled an announcing team of Thom Brennaman, better known for calling Fox baseball; Barry Alvarez, the former Wisconsin coach; and Charles Davis, who is on loan from TBS.
